summary: Allows you to almost instantly become a vampire
descriptionHtml:
ReadMe

these files will allow you to almost instantly become a vampire

place the files into the same directory as TESV.exe (or just the ones you want)
open your console and type BAT <Filename.txt> : the file name is the file that corresponds to your race.

I.E.
Race: Nord --> bat nordvampire.txt

NOTE
- You must feed in order to gain the abilities and effects of a vampire.
- It will work if you are a werewolf.
- You can change your base race using this, however if you use Beast form you will revert to the race you were before.
author: NatPro38

files.name: Instant_Vampirism_Bats_V1_1
files.changelogHtml: Resets Rising at Dawn quest for cure
